name: Remote Patient Monitoring Systems
benefits: Early detection of health issues, reduced hospital readmissions
functionality: Monitors vital signs such as heart rate, blood pressure, and oxygen levels, transmitting data to healthcare providers.

name: Smart Infusion Pumps
functionality: Delivers precise dosages of medication and fluids, can be programmed remotely and monitored in real-time.

name: Smart Beds
functionality: Adjustable beds that monitor patient movement, pressure, and vital signs, providing alerts for potential issues.

name: Wearable Health Devices
functionality: Devices that track fitness metrics, heart rate, sleep patterns, and can share data with healthcare providers.

name: Telemedicine Solutions
benefits: Increased access to care, reduced travel for patients
functionality: Enables video consultations and remote evaluations between patients and healthcare providers.

name: Environmental Monitoring Systems
benefits: Improved infection control, enhanced patient comfort
functionality: Monitors temperature, humidity, and air quality in hospital settings, ensuring optimal conditions.

name: Asset Tracking Systems
benefits: Reduced loss of equipment, improved utilization
functionality: Tracks the location and usage of medical equipment using RFID or GPS technology.

name: Smart Pill Dispensers
benefits: Improved patient compliance, reduced medication errors
functionality: Dispenses medications at scheduled times, provides alerts for missed doses, and tracks adherence.

name: Smart Surgical Instruments
functionality: Connected surgical tools that provide real-time data and insights during procedures.

name: AI-Powered Diagnostic Tools
functionality: Utilizes machine learning algorithms to analyze medical images and data, assisting in diagnostics.
